utilities

Class About

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.About

  • public class About
extends java.lang.Object
    This small utility is used to display two text files: 'About' G_String, and 'About' urGenova as part of 'Help'
    Version:
    %v..%
    Author:
    ralph
    See Also:
    utilities.About
